				"OnAttackLanded"

					{

				"Attributes"		"MODIFIER_ATTRIBUTE_PERMANENT"
			}
			"modifier_sorceress_immortal_ice_avatar"
			{
				"IsHidden"	"1"
				"StatusEffectName" 		"particles/roshpit/tanari/status_effect_spirit_blue.vpcf"
				"StatusEffectPriority"  "80"
				"EffectName"			"particles/roshpit/sorceress/ice_avatar.vpcf"
				"EffectAttachType"		"attach_origin"
				"ThinkInterval"  "0.2"
				"States"
				{
					"MODIFIER_STATE_UNSELECTABLE"		"MODIFIER_STATE_VALUE_ENABLED"
				}
				"OnIntervalThink"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"items/weapon_effects"
						"Function"		"sorceress_avatar_think"
						"target"		"TARGET"
					}
				}
				"OnDeath"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"items/weapon_effects"
						"Function"		"sorc_avatar_die"
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

					{

						"Function"		"update_bahamut_pulse"
						"target"		"TARGET"
					}
				}
				"OnCreated"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"heroes/leshrac/leshrac_blink.lua"
						"Function"		"update_bahamut_pulse"
						"target"		"TARGET"
					}
				}
				"OnDestroy"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"heroes/leshrac/leshrac_blink.lua"
						"Function"		"remove_bahamut_pulse"
						"target"		"TARGET"
					}
				}
			}
		}
		"AbilitySpecial"
		{
			"01"
			{
				"var_type"				"FIELD_FLOAT"
				"property_one"			"1.5"
			}
		}

		"ItemShareability"	"ITEM_FULLY_SHAREABLE"
		"ItemDeclarations"	"DECLARE_PURCHASES_TO_TEAMMATES | DECLARE_PURCHASES_TO_SPECTATORS"
		"MaxUpgradeLevel"	"1"
		"ItemBaseLevel"	"1"
		"Model" 		"models/props_gameplay/tpscroll01.vmdl"
		"Modifiers"
		{
			"modifier_chernobog_glyph_7_1"
			{
				"Passive"			"0"
				"IsHidden"			"1"
				"IsDebuff"			"0"
				"Attributes"		"MODIFIER_ATTRIBUTE_PERMANENT"
				"ThinkInterval"  "0.2"

				"OnCreated"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"heroes/nightstalker/glyphs.lua"
						"Function"		"glyph71Add"
						"target"		"TARGET"
					}
				}
				"OnDestroy"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"heroes/nightstalker/glyphs.lua"
						"Function"		"glyph71Remove"
						"target"		"TARGET"
					}
				}
			}
		}
		"AbilitySpecial"
		{
			"01"
			{
				"var_type"				"FIELD_INTEGER"
				"property_one"			"30"
			}
		}
	}

			{
				"Passive"	"0"
				"IsHidden"	"1"
				"Attributes" "MODIFIER_ATTRIBUTE_PERMANENT"
				"OnCreated"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"items/equipment.lua"
						"Function"		"equip_arcana"
						"target"		"TARGET"
						"index"			"1"
					}
				}
				"OnDestroy"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"items/equipment.lua"
						"Function"		"unequip_arcana"
						"target"		"TARGET"
						"index"			"1"
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

		"AbilityBehavior"	"DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_NO_TARGET | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IGNORE_BACKSWING"
		"AbilityUnitTargetTeam"	"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_TEAM_ENEMY"
		"AbilityUnitTargetType"	"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_HERO"
		"BaseClass"	"item_datadriven"
		"AbilityTextureName"	"weapons/legends/hydroxis_immortal_weapon_2"
		"AbilityCastRange"	"900"
		"AbilityCastPoint"	"0"
		"AbilityCooldown"	"0"
		"AbilityManaCost"	"0"
		"ItemPermanent"			"0"
		"ItemQuality"			"common"
		"ItemDroppable"	"1"
		"ItemShareability"	"ITEM_FULLY_SHAREABLE"
		"ItemDeclarations"	"DECLARE_PURCHASES_TO_TEAMMATES | DECLARE_PURCHASES_TO_SPECTATORS"
		"MaxUpgradeLevel"	"1"
		"ItemBaseLevel"	"1"
		"Model" 		"models/props_gameplay/red_box.vmdl"
		"OnSpellStart"
		{
			"RunScript"
			{
				"ScriptFile"	"items/equipment.lua"
				"Function"		"equip_item"
			}
		}
		"Modifiers"
		{
			"modifier_hydroxis_immortal_weapon_2"
			{
				"Passive"			"0"
				"IsHidden"			"1"
				"IsDebuff"			"0"
				"Attributes"		"MODIFIER_ATTRIBUTE_PERMANENT"
			}
			"modifier_hydroxis_immortal_push"
			{
				"IsHidden"	"1"
				"ThinkInterval"  "0.03"
				"OnIntervalThink"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"heroes/slardar/slippery_tail"
						"Function"		"immortal_2_push"
						"target"        "TARGET"
					}
				}
				"OnDestroy"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"heroes/slardar/slippery_tail"
						"Function"		"immortal_2_push_end"
						"target"        "TARGET"
					}
				}
			}
		}
		"AbilitySpecial"
		{
			"01"
			{
				"var_type"			"FIELD_FLOAT"
				"property_one"			"1.2"
			}
		}
	}

			"01"

					"RunScript"

						"ScriptFile"	"heroes/zuus/seraph_surge.lua"
						"Function"		"shadow_flay_effect_think"
						"target"		"TARGET"
					}
				}
				"OnCreated"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"heroes/zuus/seraph_surge.lua"
						"Function"		"shadow_flay_start"
						"target"		"TARGET"
					}
				}
				"OnDestroy"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"heroes/zuus/seraph_surge.lua"
						"Function"		"shadow_flay_end"
						"target"		"TARGET"
					}
				}
				"Properties"
				{
				    "MODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE" "-20"
				}
			}

		"ItemShareability"	"ITEM_FULLY_SHAREABLE"
		"ItemDeclarations"	"DECLARE_PURCHASES_TO_TEAMMATES | DECLARE_PURCHASES_TO_SPECTATORS"
		"MaxUpgradeLevel"	"1"
		"ItemBaseLevel"	"1"
		"Model" 		"models/props_gameplay/treasure_chest001.vmdl"
		"OnSpellStart"
		{
			"RunScript"
			{
				"ScriptFile"	"items/equipment.lua"
				"Function"		"equip_item"
			}
		}
		"AbilitySpecial"
		{
			"01"
			{
				"var_type"			"FIELD_INTEGER"
				"property_one"			"200"
			}
			"02"
			{
				"var_type"			"FIELD_INTEGER"
				"property_two"		"30"
			}
			"03"
			{
				"var_type"			"FIELD_INTEGER"
				"property_three"		"12"
			}
			"04"
			{
				"var_type"			"FIELD_INTEGER"
				"property_four"		"5"
			}
		}
		"Modifiers"
		{
			"modifier_berserker_gloves_base"
			{
				"Passive"			"0"
				"IsHidden"			"1"
				"IsDebuff"			"0"
				"OnAttackLanded"
				// "%attack_damage" is set to the damage value before mitigation
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"items/special_item_effects.lua"
						"Function"		"berserker_gloves_attack_land"
					}
				}
			}
			"modifier_berserker_gloves_buff_visible"
			{
				"StatusEffectName" 		"particles/status_fx/status_effect_battle_hunger.vpcf"
				"StatusEffectPriority"  "10"
				"OnCreated"
				{
					"AttachEffect"
					{
						"EffectName"        "particles/units/heroes/hero_axe/axe_battle_hunger.vpcf"
						"EffectAttachType"  "follow_overhead"
						"Target"            "TARGET"
					}
					"FireSound"
					{
						"EffectName"	"RPCItems.BerserkerGloves"
						"Target" 		"TARGET"
					}
				}
				"IsHidden"	"0"
				"TextureName"	"axe_battle_hunger"
				"IsBuff"	"1"
				"Properties"
				{
					"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT" "%property_two"
				}
			}
			"modifier_berserker_gloves_buff_invisible"

		"AbilityBehavior"	"DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_NO_TARGET | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IGNORE_BACKSWING"
		"AbilityUnitTargetTeam"	"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_TEAM_ENEMY"
		"AbilityUnitTargetType"	"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_HERO"
		"BaseClass"	"item_datadriven"
		"AbilityTextureName"	"rpc/demonfire_gauntlet" //"far_seers_enchanted_gloves"
		"AbilityCastRange"	"900"
		"AbilityCastPoint"	"0"
		"AbilityCooldown"	"0"
		"AbilityManaCost"	"0"
		"ItemPermanent"			"0"
		"AbilityUnitDamageType"	"DAMAGE_TYPE_MAGICAL"
		"ItemQuality"			"common"
		"ItemDroppable"	"1"
		"ItemShareability"	"ITEM_FULLY_SHAREABLE"
		"ItemDeclarations"	"DECLARE_PURCHASES_TO_TEAMMATES | DECLARE_PURCHASES_TO_SPECTATORS"
		"MaxUpgradeLevel"	"1"
		"ItemBaseLevel"	"1"
		"Model" 		"models/props_gameplay/treasure_chest001.vmdl"
		"precache"
		{
			"particle"  "particles/units/heroes/hero_lion/lion_spell_finger_of_death.vpcf"
		}
		"OnSpellStart"
		{
			"RunScript"
			{
				"ScriptFile"	"items/equipment.lua"
				"Function"		"equip_item"
			}
		}
		"Modifiers"
		{
			"modifier_demonfire_gauntlet"
			{
				"Passive"			"0"
				"IsHidden"			"1"
				"IsDebuff"			"0"
				"Attributes"		"MODIFIER_ATTRIBUTE_PERMANENT"
				"OnAttackLanded"
				// "%attack_damage" is set to the damage value before mitigation
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"items/special_item_effects.lua"
						"Function"		"demonfire_attack_land"
					}
				}
			}
			"modifier_demonfire_stack"
			{
				"IsHidden"	"0"
				"IsBuff"	"1"
				"TextureName"	"lion_finger_of_death"
				"OnDestroy"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"items/special_item_effects.lua"
						"Function"		"demonfire_end"
						"target"		"TARGET"
					}
				}
			}
		}
		"AbilitySpecial"
		{
			"01"
			{
				"var_type"			"FIELD_INTEGER"
				"element_one"			"15"
			}
			"02"
			{
				"var_type"			"FIELD_INTEGER"
				"element_two"			"2"
			}
			"03"
			{
				"var_type"			"FIELD_INTEGER"
				"property_one"			"30"
			}
			"04"
			{

				"property_two"			"100"
			}
